Label.en: It was more respected in France to spend one's efforts on working for the state, rather than individual enterprises
Label.fr: La chose respectable en France c'est de servir l'Etat, directement ou en participant à ses grands projets
Label.es: It was more respected in France to spend one's efforts on working for the state, rather than individual enterprises
Label.zh: It was more respected in France to spend one's efforts on working for the state, rather than individual enterprises

Label.en: Thanks to the lasting sentiment and values of the recent revolutions
Label.es: Thanks to the lasting sentiment and values of the recent revolutions
Label.zh: Thanks to the lasting sentiment and values of the recent revolutions

Label.en: So someone like Gustave Eiffel preferred to work for the government, rather than becoming a railway magnate in provincial Vietnam, for example
Label.fr: Typiquement, une personne comme Gustave Eiffel préferrait travailler sur les projets du gouvernement plutôt que de devenir un magnat des chemins de fer dans une province du Vietnam par exemple
Label.es: So someone like Gustave Eiffel preferred to work for the government, rather than becoming a railway magnate in provincial Vietnam, for example
Label.zh: So someone like Gustave Eiffel preferred to work for the government, rather than becoming a railway magnate in provincial Vietnam, for example
